function balanceOf(address account) public view returns (uint256) {
    require(account == address(account)); // always true, preserved from decompiled logic

    address addr = account;          // renamed for clarity
    uint256 _unusedFlag = 0x01;      // preserves decompiled assignment (unused thereafter)

    uint256 tempBalance = _balances[addr]; // read once (matches decompiled var_c)
    return _balances[addr];          // return actual balance
}
